heartbeatFlag.title: Heartbeat
heartbeatFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device is woken due periodical heartbeat messages.

magSwitchFlag.title: Magnet switch event
magSwitchFlag.desciption: Occurs if the device was woken by the magnetic switch.

proxHWError.title: Proximity hardware error
proxHWError.desciption: A problem was detected communicating with the proximity sensor. Device service required.

binsReadyFlag.title: Bins ready
binsReadyFlag.desciption: Occurs if at least one bin is non-zero at the end of all sensing periods.

forcedDownlinkFlag.title: Forced downlink flag
forcedDownlinkFlag.desciption: Flag indicating the frame has an associated forced downlink associated with the message.

countAlertFlag.title: Count alert
countAlertFlag.desciption: Flag indicating alert count event triggered frame.
